AlertDefinition.Description: This alert is raised when an expired SSL certificate is detected on a managed node
AlertDefinition.Name: Expired SSL certificate

d2p1:ActionProperty.d2p1:PropertyValue: ALERT: Expired SSL certificate on ${N=SwisEntity;M=Caption} , ${N=SwisEntity;M=IPAddress} : ${SQL: SELECT orion_node_port FROM orion_aux_db.dbo.orion_flash_expiredsslalert where orion_node_id =${N=SwisEntity;M=NodeID} } at ${N=Alerting;M=AlertTriggerTime;F=DateTime}

d2p1:ActionDefinition.d2p1:Description:
To: serban.teodorescu@phsa.ca,james.reilly@hssbc.ca,leonard.mooney@phsa.ca
From: serban.teodorescu@phsa.ca
Subject: ALERT: Expired SSL certificate on ${N=SwisEntity;M=Caption} , ${N=SwisEntity;M=IPAddress} : ${SQL: SELECT orion_node_port FROM orion_aux_db.dbo.orion_flash_expiredsslalert where orion_node_id =${N=SwisEntity;M=NodeID} } at ${N=Alerting;M=AlertTriggerTime;F=DateTime}
d2p1:ActionDefinition.d2p1:Title: Send an Email/Page (Expired SSL certificate on ${N=SwisEntity;M=Caption} at ${N=Alerting;M=AlertTriggerTime;F=DateTime})
